ContentMutiple.name: Solana Could Become The ‘Visa of Crypto’: Bank of America
ContentMutiple.description: Bank of America says that Solana (SOL) could end up becoming the ‘Visa’ of the digital asset ecosystem.
ContentMutiple.content:
Bank of America says that Solana (SOL) could end up becoming the ‘Visa’ of the digital asset ecosystem.

Writing in a note to Business Insider, BofA analyst Alkesh Shah said that Solana could continue to take market share from Ethereum due to its more user-friendly design.

Shah said that the valuation gap between Solana and Etheruem presents an opportunity for SOL, as its differentiation is “proving successful.” BofA’s note reportedly highlighted Solana’s lower transaction fees, ease of use, and potential for scalability compared to other cryptocurrencies.

"These innovations allow for the processing of an industry-leading ~65,000 transactions per second with average transaction fees of $0.00025, while remaining relatively decentralized and secure," Shah explained.

With the 5.7 million NFTs minted on the Solana network, plus 400 different projects current running on it, Shah says the fifth largest crypto asset by market cap is showing signs of “significant adoption” and the potential for more. He says Solana can become the “Visa of the digital asset ecosystem” with its optimized structure for micropayments.

Image via Shutterstock 

"These innovations allow for the processing of an industry-leading ~65,000 transactions per second with average transaction fees of $0.00025, while remaining relatively decentralized and secure," Shah explained.

The analyst suggested that Ethereum’s priciness and lesser ability to scale compared to Solana could mean that it gets designated for “high-value transactions and identity, storage and supply chain use cases,” while Solana gets used for micropayments.

While known for sacrificing some decentralization compared to Ethereum and weathering multiple DoS attacks since its launch, Solana is still nearly 30,000% up from its lows of May 2020. SOL currently trades for $149 at the time of writing.
ContentMutiple.seo_title: Solana Could Become The ‘Visa of Crypto’: Bank of America

ContentMutiple.name: Binance Copy Trading (2025): Real ROI, Risks & Smarter Picks
ContentMutiple.description: See how Binance copy trading actually performs in 2025. Real trader stats, risks, and better alternatives like Bybit & Bitget revealed.
ContentMutiple.content:
Title: 

Meta Description: 

Slug: 

Thinking about using Binance Copy Trading in 2025 — but not sure if it’s really worth it? You're not alone. With dozens of platforms promising “easy profits,” it's hard to know what's real, what works, and what’s just hype.

In this breakdown, we’ll go beyond the marketing. You’ll see:

  • Real performance stats from actual Binance lead traders

  • A head-to-head comparison with Bybit and Bitget

  • Key risks most beginners overlook

  • And smarter ways to copy trade in 2025 — based on real data

Let’s find out if Binance is the best fit for you — or if smarter alternatives offer more control and better ROI.

(PIC – Binance copy trading dashboard 2025: lead trader list, ROI, AUM...)

📆 Quick Comparison – Binance vs Bybit vs Bitget

(PIC – Table comparing Binance, Bybit, and Bitget: copy fee, risk metrics, backtesting, social insights)

Feature Binance Bybit Bitget
Copy Fee Up to 30% 10–15% Fixed or % (max 20%)
Risk Metrics ❌ None ✅ Basic Drawdown ✅ Filters + Drawdown
Backtesting ❌ No ✅ Limited ✅ Yes
Social Insight ❌ Minimal ✅ Comments, Stats ✅ Rich trader data
Best For Beginners, passive seekers Balanced control + ROI Advanced filters, copy diversification

✨ What Is Binance Copy Trading & How It Works

Binance Copy Trading allows users to automatically mirror trades from experienced lead traders. It’s a passive way to engage in futures trading without making manual decisions.

How it works:

  1. Browse the Binance Futures Copy Trading Leaderboard

  2. Choose a trader based on ROI, AUM, and followers

  3. Set your budget (minimum $10)

  4. The system auto-replicates their trades into your account

📌 No prior trading experience required. But convenience comes at the cost of transparency and control.

(PIC – Screenshot of Binance trader leaderboard)

🔍 Is Binance Copy Trading Actually Profitable?

📦 Reality Check: Is Copy Trading Right for You?

✅ Copy trading may work if:

  • You're okay with short-term volatility

  • You track ROI weekly, not blindly follow

  • You diversify across multiple traders with moderate risk

🚫 It’s NOT for you if:

  • You expect guaranteed profit

  • You copy 1 trader with 100% of your capital

  • You're risk-averse and never analyze performance

(PIC – Pros & cons of copy trading: ROI vs risk, control vs automation)

💡 Instead of chasing signals, focus on building a strategy. Copy trading is a tool – not a shortcut to riches.

📊 Real Trader Stats (April 2025)

Based on Binance's public leaderboard, here are sample stats from verified lead traders:

(PIC – ROI table of 5 Binance lead traders: ROI %, Win rate, AUM)

Trader 30-Day ROI Win Rate AUM (USDT) Profit Share
Trader Max +14.7% 88% 24,000 10%
CryptoZilla +9.3% 79% 15,500 15%
VoltX +3.1% 64% 9,700 20%
DegenPro –1.8% 52% 4,200 10%
LunaRocket +17.5% 91% 28,600 12%

🛠️ Important: Past ROI does not guarantee future results. Always check consistency, drawdown, and strategy.

💸 Trading Fees & Copy Commission (2025)

Binance Futures Fees:

  • Maker: 0.02%, Taker: 0.05%

  • 25% discount using BNB

Copy Trading Commission:

  • Lead traders earn up to 30% profit share

  • Auto-deducted only on profitable trades

💡 Always check each trader's fee rate before copying.

✅ Pros & Cons of Binance Copy Trading

Pros:

  • Beginner-friendly setup

  • Large trader pool

  • Mobile app integration

  • Passive income potential

Cons:

  • ❌ Limited risk stats (no drawdown)

  • ❌ No backtesting tools

  • ❌ No mid-trade adjustments

  • ❌ Some traders use high leverage

🏆 Binance vs Bybit vs Bitget: Which One Wins?

(PIC – Feature comparison infographic: transparency, control, filters)

Feature Binance Bybit Bitget
Market Access Futures Futures Spot + Futures
Copy Fee Up to 30% 10–15% Up to 20% or fixed
Risk Metrics ❌ None ✅ Basic Drawdown ✅ Advanced Filters
Backtesting ❌ No ✅ Limited ✅ Yes
Social Insight ❌ Minimal ✅ Comments & Stats ✅ Rich Data
Leaderboard Clarity ✅ Yes ✅ Yes ✅ Yes

📌 Binance is solid, but Bybit and Bitget offer more control, visibility, and risk filters.

🧠 Who Should (and Shouldn’t) Use Binance Copy Trading?

Great for:

  • Busy professionals

  • Beginners without time to manually trade

  • Users comfortable with moderate risk

Not ideal for:

  • Traders wanting full control

  • Risk-averse investors

  • Anyone expecting guaranteed returns

(PIC – User personas: beginners, passive investors, risk averse)

🤖 Smarter Alternatives in 2025

🔹 Bybit Copy Trading

  • Transparent dashboard

  • Auto-ranking based on trader stability

  • Adjustable risk settings

🔹 Bitget One-Click Copy

  • Advanced risk filters

  • Selection by drawdown & ROI consistency

  • Flexible profit-sharing models

(PIC – Bybit vs Bitget overview: UI screenshots, risk settings)

❓ Frequently Asked Questions (PAA)

Can you do copy trading on Binance?

Yes. Binance offers copy trading via its Futures platform, allowing users to automatically follow professional traders. Minimum is $10.

How do you make $100 a day on Binance?

To make $100 daily, you’d need consistent high ROI and enough capital. Copy trading may help, but results depend on trader performance.

How to find a good copy trader in Binance?

Look for traders with consistent ROI, low drawdown, and high win rate. Avoid those using high leverage or with sharp equity swings.

What is the best copy trading platform for crypto?

Top platforms include Bybit, Bitget, and Binance. Bybit offers better risk filters; Bitget has backtesting and trader metrics.

Can I trade with $1 in Binance?

Technically yes — with certain tokens on Spot. But for Copy Trading, Binance requires a minimum of $10 to follow a lead trader.

How much can I earn from Binance per day?

Returns vary. Some traders show 10–20% monthly ROI, but no income is guaranteed. Always monitor performance and diversify.

How to make 10 dollars a day on Binance?

You could reach $10/day with consistent gains and a $500–$1,000 balance. Copy trading can help — if you follow solid traders.

What is the fee for copy trading in Binance?

Binance charges up to 30% profit share to lead traders. This is only deducted from your realized profits, not your balance.

📅 Why You Might Try It Now

Still deciding? Here’s why some users are trying Binance Copy Trading:

  • Verified traders with consistent double-digit ROI

  • No manual trades — full automation

  • Up to $100 bonus for new users with referral code Z7NCPK27

  • Start with as little as $10

(PIC – Binance copy trading bonus banner: $100 USDT, referral code Z7NCPK27)

✅ Final Checklist Before You Start:

  • Started with less than $100

  • Picked 2–3 consistent traders

  • Checked drawdown & fees

  • Set weekly review reminders

  • Read the fine print

Binance Copy Trading isn’t perfect — but it does offer an easy way to get started. If you’re looking for full automation and verified traders with consistent ROI, it can be a great entry point.

But here’s the key:
📌 Start small. Track weekly. Diversify. Always review drawdown and strategy.

If you want more transparency and smarter risk filters, platforms like Bybit and Bitget may offer better long-term value.

🌟 Whatever you choose, copy with a strategy — not just hype.

🚀 Ready to test Binance Copy Trading now?
Start with $10 and unlock your $100 bonus using code Z7NCPK27.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions (PAA)

Can you do copy trading on Binance?

Yes. Binance offers copy trading via its Futures platform, allowing users to automatically follow professional traders. Minimum is $10.

How do you make $100 a day on Binance?

To make $100 daily, you’d need consistent high ROI and enough capital. Copy trading may help, but results depend on trader performance.

How to find a good copy trader in Binance?

Look for traders with consistent ROI, low drawdown, and high win rate. Avoid those using high leverage or with sharp equity swings.

What is the best copy trading platform for crypto?

Top platforms include Bybit, Bitget, and Binance. Bybit offers better risk filters; Bitget has backtesting and trader metrics.

Can I trade with $1 in Binance?

Technically yes — with certain tokens on Spot. But for Copy Trading, Binance requires a minimum of $10 to follow a lead trader.

How much can I earn from Binance per day?

Returns vary. Some traders show 10–20% monthly ROI, but no income is guaranteed. Always monitor performance and diversify.

How to make 10 dollars a day on Binance?

You could reach $10/day with consistent gains and a $500–$1,000 balance. Copy trading can help — if you follow solid traders.

What is the fee for copy trading in Binance?

Binance charges up to 30% profit share to lead traders. This is only deducted from your realized profits, not your balance.
